<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Start the data deletion"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/2.0/people/remove/start"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Starts the data deletion for the user with the ID specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"userId":{"description":"User ID","type":"string"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Deletion progress","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","title":"RemoveProgressItem"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
